function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 within supply chains","Impact":"Disruption of international supply chains, leading to economic impact and spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene and safety protocols within supply chains, testing and isolation of infected individuals","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, remote monitoring and surveillance systems","People":"Market share-dealing participants, international trade stakeholders","Owner":"Businesses, international trade organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of widespread transmission in public settings","Impact":"Increase in cases, overwhelming public health systems, and societal impact","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing, widespread testing, and contact tracing","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, remote monitoring and surveillance systems","People":"Concerned policy makers, public health systems, general public","Owner":"Government authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Dependency on the development of a vaccine","Impact":"Delay in controlling the spread of the disease, prolonging the economic and social impact","Mitigation":"Investment in alternative treatments, research on antiviral drugs, and improved public health measures","Technologies":"Biotechnology and pharmaceutical research, telemedicine","People":"Informed observers, public health researchers, medical professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
